text:
<@U22PJPGK0> and HS devs - The HubDB docs state that it cannot be used to customize Marketing emails, but can it be used to customize Transactional emails?
<http://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/hubdb>

<@U22PJPGK0> a developer of ours found that if there is a custom module built that pulls in hubdb information that is put into an email, the HTML is output and sent (tested on gmail). could we use a contact property within an if statement to pull in a different hubdb-based custom module?
you can use hubdb in a email but you canâ€™t personalize it by contact. The HubDB functions are run before contact expressions are evaluated
